item.title: Important ideas
item.description: Reinforcement Learning Consciousness Modularity Causal inference Evolution Ability to use tool Language ( giving identity to our feelings) randomness sub-representation Reprasentation learning Images of Important Ideas tools RL randomness Exact sequence attention action = observation Circle of time. World view Different feeling Randomness/ Predictability. Time Space Separation/ Identity Intelligence/ consciousness. Drive ( unmoved mover) Creativity. Free will How log is this present? How past -> future? where is action action min comes from?
